description: This file defines a React component called ProtectedRoute, which enforces user authentication before granting access to child components. It leverages React Router for navigation and context for authentication state. The component manages visual loading states and redirects unauthenticated users to the signin page, optionally permitting guest access.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, allowGuest = false })
methods.description: React functional component that enforces authentication for its children, with optional guest access.

ctags.name: ProtectedRoute
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProtectedRoute({ children, allowGuest = false }) {$/
